runs.comm: bowls a slider outside off, the batsman doesn't waste any time, punches it to wide mid-off for a single
he plants his front foot out and blasts a drive, straight to Gayle at cover
this has almost gone to mid-off! But Dilshan comes down the pitch and hammers it hard.. The fielder didn't have much time, it flew past his left..Sammy, didn't have much chance
goes on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery to cover
slower and on the pads, the batsman looks to work it to the leg side but is rapped on the pad
another quicker and flatter delivery outside off, Dilshan, who was looking to advance, chops it to point
starts off with a slower one, KJP allows it to come in and whips it to deep midwicket.. He hares back for a second. Excellent running
full, swinging, but down the leg side. KJP loves to flex his muscles on the leg side.. there is a reason why he is compared to The Sanath.. flicks it to the fine-leg boundary
length delivery on off stump, good line by the bowler, but KJP stays in the crease and punches it to wide mid-on for a couple
short and wide outside off but doesn't get up too much with that slingy action, KJP gets some room to swing his bat to the leg side, manages to hammer it over that midwicket fielder
sensible from KJP.. Stays in the crease and calmly bunts the length delivery to short cover
a slower ball on the middle stump line, but KJP has had enough violence this over, he defends it calmly to midwicket
comes down the pitch, makes room and calmly picks it up over long off.. This keeps sailing.. this is a beautiful pick-up shot..SL are racing away
an appeal for caught behind as Dilshan misses a sweep shot! But it flicked the pads en route to the keeper
he comes down the pitch and easily flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
bowls a googly, KJP is in no hurry, he dabs this to mid-on to complete and easy single
flatter and quicker delivery on the stumps, Dilshan goes deep in the crease and works it away to deep midwicket for a single

now KJP uses his feet! This is a beautiful straight hit.. He makes the flighted delivery a half-volley and smashes it to the long-off advertising boards.. Badree is being taken apart here.. The ball has been damaged
lovely cutter from Santokie! Dilshan read it was a slower ball but didn't account for the movement of the pitch, he is beaten outside off
another slower delivery, 108 kph, the batsman pushes it to cover off the front foot
floater outside off, Russell at long-on was there for that shot! but KJP makes a perfect connection.. It sails, and sails, never comes down.. goes over the head of the long-on fielder. Superb hit
looks to hit it across the line as the bowler bowls another slower delivery, gets hit on the pads, but picks up a leg bye
back of length delivery on the pads, normal speed, Dilshan comes forward and whips it to deep midwicket

oh no! He was looking so good, but KJP plays back to this length delivery and chops it on to his middle and leg stump! Santokie doesn't show any emotion, but I am sure he is releived. Fantastic start to the innings by KJP though
goes back to work it on the leg side, but gets hit above the knee roll

he was looking to cut this hard, but chopped it on to point. Mahela was late to respond to the call and he is gone.. This is disaster for Mahela.. out without facing a ball. .He was a touch too late to start. I hope this is not his last innings!
he waits on the back foot and defends the quicker delivery to the leg side
looks to pull a leg-side delivery, but gets hit on the pads again.. They run a leg bye to short fine leg
he stays in the crease and punches a flatter delivery to deep midwicket for  a single
tossed up outside off, Sanga comes forward and slices his drive to point
Narine who, says that shot from Dilshan as he swings his bat across the line to whack this to deep midwicket
tossed up delivery outside off, Sanga comes forward and easily pushes it to deep cover, no problems for the master
this is the offspinner, turns in sharply and Dilshan misses his nudge to the leg side, gets hit on the pads
this time he gets some bat on it as he dabs it to midwicket and picks up two as the field is spread out
on the pads again, Dilshan clips it easily to deep backward square leg for a single
flatter and spins conventionally, Sanga comes forward and defends that down the pitch solidly
he bowls this quicker delivery on the pads and Dilshan picks up a quick single to short fine leg with a nudge

now it's Sanga! Badree takes a wicket afterall! Unlike his previous deliveries, he tosses this one right up and Sanga cannot control his push.. lobs it up in the air for the bowler to take a simple chance.. Tragedy for Sri Lanka, but West Indies are quickly coming back. He probably closed the face a bit too early and the little turn on that one did him
slower through the air, the batsman comes forward and defends
waits on the back foot and cuts it straight to point
this is much quicker - a bit like Afridi - Thirimanne is hurried in his defensive shot but manages to push it to point
he comes forward and drives it to long off for a single
plays a deft late cut to this shorter one, but is not able to beat short third man
full toss on the pads, Lahiru calmly flicks it to deep midwicket
quicker and shorter outside off, the batsman swivels in the crease to pull this to deep square leg
fired on the pads, Lahiru whips it to deep midwicket off the back foot
quicker outside off, Dilshan sees the room and looks to cut it, but finds the man at point
fuller on the middle stump, the batsman drives it to wide long on for another single
yeah, and he proves the stats right.. bowls it full on the pads and Dilshan whips it past the short fine leg fielder for a welcome boundary
that was there to be hit! Short and wide at 140 kph, but Dilshan is disappointed as he makes no connection

a low full toss outside off, the batsman hits it to wide long-off off the toe-end of the bat and calls for a second.. but Thirimanne would have been in trouble had Russell collected the ball.. surely in trouble
looks for a yorker wide outside off, the batsman digs it out to the bowler
he is bowling that wide outside off line, bowls it full too.. Dilshan drives it to deep point without much timing
lovely shot for a single! Thirimanne arches back to a short delivery and plays an upper cut down to third man
some turn for the bowler from round the wicket, the batsman picks up a single to the left of point
he comes forward and pushes it to cover with soft hands, picks up a single
slower this time from Samuels.. slower is relative though, it's still 93 kph.. the batsman defends
bowls it nicely outside off, some turn there too, the batsman pushes it to the cover fielder
slightly short, the batsman looks to cut but doesn't generate any force in the shot, played to point
he comes forward and clips the fuller delivery to deep midwicket for a single
bowls a filthy long hop that Thirimanne hammers to the deep midwicket boundary with a powerful pull
fuller delivery this time, Thirimanne pushes it softly towards long on and calls for a second.. Does it comfortably as Santokie is not able to collect the ball cleanly
slower and fuller on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep midwicket for an easy single
he misses out on a juicy full toss! That probably came a touch quicker and Dilshan only manages to push it to long on
makes room and looks to cut, but gets beaten
he comes forward and drives it to long on for a single
he comes forward and chips it over the point fielder, it's kind of a sliced shot.. falls short of the deep point fielder
shorter and quicker outside off, the batsman goes deep in the crease and punches it firmly to deep cover
slower this time and on the stumps, Thirimanne waits for it, opens the face to dab it in front of point for another single
quicker but wide outside off, easily punched to deep cover off the back foot
this one is off the middle and goes a mile! Thirimanne goes down on his knee and soon as he spots the loop in the delivery and slogs it over deep midwicket. Handsome shot
immediately shortens his length, the batsman defends it calmly to cover
beats the bat with the extra bounce.. the batsman was looking to cut it off the back foot
slower this time, Dilshan clips it to short fine leg with the turn and calls for a quick single
that was a good shout as he slips in a quicker delivery that turns in into the lefty.. The batsman is hit on the pads, but that was missing leg stump probably
he waits and chops the shorter delivery fine on the off side, but the short third man fielder dives to prevent any more than one
the doosra, it beats the bat as Dilshan looks to play a late cut
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman calmly pushes it to long on for a single
flatter and quicker outside off, Dilshan smartly tucks it to midwicket with soft hands and comes back for the second
shorter and quicker, keeps the batsman back in the crease, but Dilshan does well to clip it behind square on the leg side this time for a second.. Badree doesn't collect it cleanly

this is gone! This is a huge wicket! There is no escape once it hits direct. Dilshan pushed it to mid-off and immediately set off, but Thirimanne wasn't interested..Dilshan, though, had come down a fair distance and needed the fielder to miss his throw.. unfortunately for him, Simmons doesn't depend on the Keeper.. fires it quick and knocks down the stumps .. Dilshan was way short that time..
he comes forward and defends the flighted delivery to the off side
dabs the quicker delivery fine on the off side for an easy single
shorter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whips it to the leg side for a single
short and wide, the batsman crunches it off the back foot, but the fielder at point gets a hand to it to keep them down to a single

more hesitation! Thirimanne comes down all the way as the batsman flicks it to short fine leg, but the throw from Marlon Samuels goes to the wrong end.. Angelo wouldn't have made it to the other end..A direct hit would have finished Thirimanne too..
poor stuff from Samuels at third man as he lets one slip through his hands.. gives away three extra runs.. just slips as he bends down
he keeps steering these short of length deliveries to third man.. Samuels is careful this time, gets his body behind the ball
on the pads and the batsman clips it to fine leg, again to Samuels, for a single

up, up and away! Superb shot from Thiri.. He backs away to the leg side, gets a short delivery outside off and whacks it with a powerful upper cut.. For a second it looks like he is going to hole out at the boundary.. but no.. that just manages to cross the rope easily
superb doosra! Big turn on that and it fizzes past the outside edge
another doosra, Angelo dabs it unconvincingly to the off side and put Thirimanne on the line with a single
fuller delivery on the middle stump, Thirimanne is looking good as he whips this to wide long on for a couple
this is the conventional offspinner, i think Thiri read it fine as he looked to push it to off, but that zips past the outside edge
he waits on the back foot and punches this easily to deep midwicket for a single
he gets a leading edge to cover but that falls safely in the gap. Angelo was looking to work the doosra to the leg side but closed the face too early
bowls a half-volley on the pads that is whipped to deep midwicket for a couple
lovely slower delivery! The batsman didn't read that at all, he gets an outside edge to short third man as he looks to push it to off
another outside edge, but this one flies over Samuels at short third man! It was the faster one, that's why it flew over the fielder.. Thirimanne had backed up too far for creating some room
slower delivery wide outside off, the batsman drags it down to long on with a flat hit
he swings to the length which is full.. I don't think he read the pace there.. But he manages to chip it to deep midwicket
another one down! He makes room, gets a slower one, looks to crash it through point.. But that lack of pace messes with his timing and he ends up giving a simple catch to Simmons at point
he comes forward and dabs it smartly to the vacant midwicket region for a couple
that's the doosra again and Angelo doesn't have a clue.. Luckily for him, he gets an outside edge to short third man to get away from the strike
another big doosra.. Prasanna doesn't have a clue as he pushes inside the line and is beaten

he doesn't think he has a chance defending, so goes for a slog sweep.. But hello hello, Bravo is manning the deep square leg boundary and does very well to leap and catch that.. the momentum though is taking him out and his flicks it in..
he is struggling to read these doosras, gets beaten again
this time he reads it fine, dabs it to point for a single.. Narine goes wicketless
useful hit by Angelo! He gets a full delivery on off and he doesn't care if it's slow or fast, he drags it over deep midwicket with a powerful mow
this is faster and Angelo gets more power on this one.. same region but this is flatter.. Bravo could have stopped that, but he looses it in the light and turns away his face.. It bounces over him

super shot! this is lovely.. Angelo moves to the leg side and punches this slower ball with an inside out drive.. There is enough fuel on this to take it to the moon.. it drops over the extra cover boundary
he goes for a yorker, the batsman whacks it to long on off the toe of the bat
another across the line hoick, this time from Prasanna.. He doesn't get much timing, but gets it in the gap for a couple
he is beaten by the slower ball as he looks to sweep it behind square, gets hit on the pads
full and wide outside off, the batsman stretches out to guide it to third man
full and wide outside off, he slices it straight to point but the fielder doesn't take an aim.. he doesn't want to give away extra runs
good yorker this time, the batsman digs it out straight down the ground and the steal a couple
short, wide, very wide..
another one, way wide.. the batsman throws his bat at that.. but this is too far away
Wallop! Full delivery, this is really a half-volley outside off and Angelo cover drives it all the way over the boundary.. Smashing shot that one
and another one! Russell is leaking.. This is short and quick and Angelo lashes his bat at that one, he was not in control, but that goes all the way over deep square leg

where has this one! Bravo takes another cracker at deep midwicket.. he makes these look so easy.. It was a low full toss that the batsman flicked in the air.. It didn't look like it would carry to the fielder, but Bravo covers the ground and gobbles it up..
